array.string: When I was young, I used to travel through the forest of Elwynn... Compose a poem：
"The mine kobolds dash, the lake murlocs rush;"
"Ah~The Boar Princess with bodyguards."
"Hogger teach you how to be a man".
With my experience as a senior game player.To tell you guys:
If you choose a girlfriend for a game of choice,You will have no girlfriend...
Two Riddles :
First One："forever joke" (It's a TPS game for put off again and again)
Second："Nothing is true everything is permitted,No computer can run smoothly"(It's a RTS game only sold in china)
Ye Highlands and ye Lowlands, Oh, where hae ye been?
They hae slain the Earl o' Moray, And Lady Mondegreen. :)
“Dungeon laughter” will be non iOS exclusive,If the developer don't transplant other platforms,I'll cut my head.
If "Dungeon Laughter" sold 1 million,I will handstand.
Some games will have the passphrase，You can try this:
“All your base are belong to us！” OR "Show me the money!"
Once upon a time, there was a gameprogrammer,He has spent 12 years in the gaming industry.
In the occasion of downhearted, Accidentally got a magic lamp, Then he make a wish:
"Hope in the lifetime to Develop a AAA grade products!" Later ~ ~ ~
Then he has eternal life.Oh right, this is a Chinese programmer.
A game designer goes to Electronic Arts for an interview.
The interviewer asked him why your resume is only one page.
He said the second page is DLC, need for paid. Then he was hired.
"Tetris" tells us: Mistakes will be accumulated, The success will disappear.
"Super Mario" tells us: Success is not to see how high you jump,And to see how far you run.
"Contra" tell us: To stop you from moving forward is not the enemy in front, But the bullet behind you!
"Snake" tells us: Beat your not the bullet with icing, But you body become longer and longerOneself is the most powerful enemy
"Lightning" tell us: People always think you're firing to the plane, In fact, they are avoiding bullets.
"Battle City" tells us: Don't just think about the fire, And take care of your bird.
Do you like big breasts? I thought you must like Laura.
It is said that Lara Crawford's breastsdisproportionately large, because the designer mouse accidentally pulled over...
